metadata.brief: A banner on the website banner rotations.

fields.name: Banner ID
fields.comment: The unique number identifying the banner.

fields.name: Name
fields.comment: A human-readable name for the banner.

fields.name: Filename
fields.comment: The relative filename of the banner.

fields.name: Uri
fields.comment: An optional link to associate with the banner.

fields.name: Days
fields.comment: Which weekdays the banner should appear in.

fields.name: Ordering
fields.comment: A number used to order the banners.
